markdownRemark.html:
“When a foolish, incompetent, bad person has three qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. … Unethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …

When an astute, competent, good person has three qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. … Ethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”

AN.3.153. Catutthakhatasutta (“Broken, 4th”)
